select p.TITLE ,p.START ,p.END ,p.STATUS ,p.ID ,p.CRE_NM ,p.PRESENT ,p.TARGET_AMT ,p.BUDGET ,c.code_Nm from PROJECT_TB p join CODE_TB c on p.status = c.code where ID = #{ID}
